title: Forgiving The Unforgivable
description: Author Sherry Johnson pens here traumatic childhood abuse in which she was raped 4 times before the age of 10. Pregnant and married at the age of 11 to cover-up this horrible tragedy she shares how she overcame it all to be a successful business woman, mother and friend. This is a must read for anyone who suffer with forgiven people who have abused you as well as stopping the cycle of abuse in your life.
author: Sherry Johnson
